hadith.text: Narrated' `Uqba bin Al-Harith:An-Nu`man or the son of An-Nu`man was brought to the Prophet (ï·º) in a state of intoxication. The Prophet felt it hard (was angry) and ordered all those who were present in the house, to beat him. And they beat him, using palm-leaf stalks and shoes, and I was among those who beat him
